Was the finished thickness of courses in accordance with the following:
(a) The finished thickness of any course shall be at least two times but not more than five times the maximum particle size as shown on the DMF except 4.75 mm.
(b) 4.75 mm mixtures shall be at least 1.5 times but not more than 3 times the maximum particle size shown on the DMF.
To achieve appropriate percentage of air voids – thicker or thinner pavement than specified thickness resulting in higher percentage of air voids
